entry.title: U.S.A. Flag - V-Neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

Elevate your casual wardrobe with this stylish V-Neck Tee. Crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric, it offers a comfortable fit that’s perfect for everyday wear. The V-neck design gives a trendy silhouette, making it suitable for various settings—from a relaxed day out to semi-formal gatherings. With its soft cotton blend, this tee ensures you'll stay cool and comfortable year-round. Ideal for those who value both fashion and function, it’s a great gift for friends and family, especially during holidays like Independence Day or Memorial Day. Celebrate patriotism and express your style with a tee that resonates with pride and comfort!

Product features
- Made with side seams for better shape retention and support.
- Elastic ribbed knit collar maintains its form wear after wear.
- Shoulder tape stabilizes seams, preventing stretch and enhancing durability.
- Constructed with lightweight fabric for versatile seasonal wear.
- Ethically made by Bella+Canvas in a humane working environment.

Care instructions
- Do not dryclean
- Machine wash: warm (max 40C or 105F)
- Non-chlorine: bleach as needed
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Iron, steam or dry: medium heat

Perfect for anyone looking to express their unique personality, this tee is a fantastic choice for birthdays, casual gatherings, and outdoor adventures. With a blend of vibrant heather colors and a smooth silhouette, it brings a charming vibe to your wardrobe. Celebrate life’s moments in comfort and style!

Product features

- Elastic ribbed knit collar retains shape
- Stylish V-neckline for a trendy look
- Made sustainably with Fair Labor certification

Perfect for any occasion, these custom tees are built without any side seams. The shoulders have twill tape for improved durability. The v-neck collar is ribbed knitting, so the fabric is unlikely to curl.

.: Light fabric (4.5 oz/yd² (153 g/m²))
.: Semi fitted
.: Tear away label

entry.title: Banff, Canada -5 - V-neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

The organic men’s v-neck t-shirt you’ve been waiting for. With a necktape covered collar seam to withstand multiple washings without losing shape, this comfortable t-shirt also features set-in sleeve hems and a bottom hem with a narrow double topstitch. Made for effortless and durable style, this is truly the organic v-neck t-shirt you need.
NB! Please note that EU-based Print Providers use European sizes in their blanks. Kindly double-check our size chart at the bottom of our listing to ensure an accurate fit.

.: 100% organic combed ringspun cotton
.: Light fabric (4.57 oz/yd² (155 g/m²))
.: Regular fit
.: Sewn in label

entry.title: Costa Rica- Beach at sundown - V-Neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

The Bella+Canva 3005 brings all-day comfort and incredible style to any wardrobe. These custom v-neck t-shirts come with a stylish V-cut and are made with a lightweight fabric that is highly breathable making it a comfy choice for any casual outing. All tees are manufactured in the US under Fair Labor Association rules for total peace of mind and garments that look good and feel good to wear.

.: The lightweight fabric (4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²)) of these custom v-neck t-shirts makes them a versatile choice for any season while the 100% cotton fabric ensures a smooth, comfortable wearing experience.
.: The retail fit along with the V-neckline ensure a stylish silhouette and a trendy, versatile appearance in any setting, whether casual or semi-formal.
.: Bella+Canvas is part of the Fair Labor Association and is Platinum WRAP certified. This means all custom v-neck t-shirts manufactured in the US and internationally are made in a humane, sustainable way, under a strict no-sweatshop policy.
.: All Bella+Canvas 3005 t-shirts come with a tear-away label.
.: Fabric blend: Heather colors - 52% cotton, 48% polyester; Athletic Heather is 90% cotton, 10% polyester.
